about.1: Committed to continuously improving my development skills and problem-solving abilities, aiming to deliver efficient technological solutions.
about.2: Enhancing my knowledge in Microsoft Power Platform, Dynamics 365, .NET, ASP.NET MVC, Node.js, Microsoft SQL Server, and Azure to deliver integrated and scalable solutions.
about.3: At Smart Consulting, I contribute to improving the efficiency and quality of our clients' projects. I have experience in adapting and configuring Dynamics 365 business applications, with a focus on Project Operations (project and finance operations), Customer Service (customer support), and Dynamics 365 Sales.
about.4: Pursuing a Bachelor's degree in Information Systems at UFOP (Federal University of Ouro Preto)
about.0: I'm a Power Platform and Dynamics 365 Developer!
about.jobDescription: | Specialist in Power Platform & Dynamics 365 | Certified Power Platform Functional Consultant [PL-200] | Business Solutions Expert
proj.chat_tcp.stack: Stack: Java Spring Boot · .NET WinForms & Avalonia · Sockets • Status: Completed (Academic)
proj.chat_tcp.desc: TCP client/server system with Automatic Server Discovery (UDP), broadcast and private messages, TCP admin, cross-platform GUI clients, plus extra integrations via Java REST API and a React web app.
proj.web_ii.stack: Stack: Java Spring Boot · PostgreSQL · React • Status: Completed (Academic)
proj.web_ii.desc: This repository contains the Sales and Users microservices, the Notification Application, and the React Frontend that together compose the Ticket Management application.
proj.investments.stack: Stack: Java Spring Boot · PostgreSQL · React • Status: Completed (Academic)
proj.investments.desc: Microservice for managing portfolios and investment assets. The solution consists of an Investments API in Spring Boot, a routing gateway, a service discovery component, and a React frontend.
cert.title.as1: Create and manage model-driven apps with Power Apps and Dataverse
cert.title.as2: Create and manage canvas apps with Power Apps
cert.title.as3: Create and manage automated processes by using Power Automate
cert.title.as4: Develop an ASP.NET Core web app that consumes an API
